name: 2022 International Conference on Machine Learning and Knowledge Engineering
content: The 2022 International Conference on Machine Learning and Knowledge Engineering (MLKE2022) will be held in Guilin, China on February 25-27, 2022\. The main topics of MLKE2022 include: Artificial Intelligence, Big Data Analysis, Deep Learning, Intelligent Software, Knowledge Engineering in Natural Language, etc. All papers, both invited and contributed, will be reviewed by two or three experts from the committees. After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers will be collected by IEEE CPS Press and published in the form of Conference Proceedings, and submitted to EI, Scopus for indexing after being published. For more details, please invite official website. http://www.icmlke.com/
